COMMENT_TX: $MLB VP Joe Torre spoke with both managers before the game about not throwing at batters

$the ball went through Jerry Hairston's legs into LF; as Yadier Molina approached 3B he and Hairston bumped slightly; Hairston was called for obstruction by 3B umpire Tim Timmons but the play was allowed to continue; when Molina scored, the obstruction was negated
$infield shifted to the right for Berkman
$3B Jerry Hairston, playing to the left of the normal SS position, ran to 2B to act as the middleman in the double play attempt
